title: Riot what did you change that is causing so many people to have connection issues.
body:
Who previously had none at all? I used to get a steay 60-70 ms in games up until a few weeks ago,(shortly after the zoe patch was released). now all of a sudden I can't connect to games at all, and when I do, the ping is so high I can't move. Can you PLEASE look into this issue and stop telling us to "use your connection troubleshooting guides" I've done everything you suggested and asked and I appreciate you want us to cover all our bases before you invest the time and resources into fixing this issue, but I think it's about time to look into it. Please.

https://imgur.com/a/ilmet

most times its just a black screen and won't show this, please note the bottom right corner where the ping indicator is 0

imagine my surprise when I actually connected this time...but wait

https://imgur.com/a/Pie8h

but my pings soo good....

https://imgur.com/a/j24Ev

why rito

replies.body: We can definitely do some deeper troubleshooting with our tech agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) do cover the basics and you need to run through those step by step first. It kind of looks like that issue might be caused by firewalls or antivirus so be sure to check those as well.
